channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scoop: Pritzker, Gallego head to Nevada in latest 2028 moves
item.description: Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker and Arizona Sen. Ruben Gallego will headline a Democratic Party event in Nevada on Feb. 1 to celebrate the late Senate Major...

item.title: "Go f*ck yourself, you're a traitor": Jack Smith hearing rocked by angry altercation
item.description: A House hearing with former Trump special counsel Jack Smith was disrupted Thursday when a former police officer who defended the Capitol on Jan. 6 co...

item.title: Trump wants lower interest rates, but the bond market won't cooperate
item.description: President Trump really, really wants lower interest rates , and the Federal Reserve and other tools of state power have tried to deliver them. The bon...

item.title: A small group of Dems looks to break from their party on ICE funding
item.description: A handful of House Democrats are readying to break with their party's leadership and vote for a bill that would fund the Department of Homeland Securi...

item.title: Jack Smith expects to be indicted by Trump DOJ
item.description: Former special counsel Jack Smith believes the Trump administration will indict him, he said during congressional testimony on Thursday. Why it matter...

item.title: Trump sues JPMorgan, Jamie Dimon over cutting off banking access
item.description: President Donald Trump filed suit against JPMorgan Chase and its CEO, Jamie Dimon, saying the bank abruptly closed his accounts.

item.title: Jack Smith defends cases against Trump in high-stakes House hearing
item.description: Former special counsel Jack Smith returned to Capitol Hill to offer his first public testimony defending his efforts to prosecute Donald Trump.

item.title: After ‘good’ Trump meeting, Zelensky pushes Europe hard to do more
item.description: President Trump and White House envoy Steve Witkoff have said a deal to resolve nearly four years of war between Russia and Ukraine is close.

item.title: Trump’s new arts commission signals support for White House ballroom
item.description: The president’s handpicked members of the Commission of Fine Arts are set to review the planned project. The White House hopes to win their approval b...

item.title: Americans give Trump low marks on handling of economy as midterms likely to center on affordability
item.description: Sixty-one percent of voters told a CNN poll released Friday that they disapprove of the way Trump is handling the economy.

item.title: Capitol agenda: Trump tests GOP with Fed probe
Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
